sn2.7:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho pañcālacaṇḍo devaputto bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn2.7:2: "Sambādhe vata okāsaṁ,Avindi bhūrimedhaso;Yo jhanamabujjhi buddho,Paṭilīnanisabho munī"ti.
sn2.7:3: "Sambādhe vāpi vindanti, (pañcālacaṇḍāti bhagavā)Dhammaṁ nibbānapattiyā;Ye satiṁ paccalatthaṁsu,Sammā te susamāhitā"ti.
